comment: This is a list of papers which is used to render in my system locally. Better way to organize, search the papers rather than piling up papers scattered in all the directories.
data: Beyond Point Clouds: Fisher Information Field for Active Visual Localization
Voxblox: Incremental 3D Euclidean Signed Distance Fields for On-Board MAV Planning
Found as a reference from Kimera
Kimera: an Open-Source Library for Real-Time Metric-Semantic Localization and Mapping
Incremental Visual-Inertial 3D Mesh Generation with Structural Regularities
Simultaneous Localization and Mapping with Infinite Planes
Keyframe-based visualâ€“inertial odometry using nonlinear optimization

As a follow-up to the on-manifold preintegration theory paper. The method present here need to reintegrate the measurements when linearization point changes during optimization. This is avoided in 'On-manifold... paper'.
A Multi-State Constraint Kalman Filter for Vision-aided Inertial Navigation
As a follow-up to the on-manifold preintegration theory paper. Specifically on the idea of elimination of landmarks from state. This idea has been re-visited and exploited in 'On-manifold...' paper.
Observability Properties and Deterministic Algorithms in Visual-Inertial Structure from Motion
As a follow-up to the on-manifold preintegration theory paper. This work presents detailed overview on observability analysis of VIO.
Read this paper on the biological inspiration to event-based cameras.
How Neuromorphic Image Sensors Steal Tricks From the Human Eye
Read this paper on the biological inspiration to event-based cameras. Takes us way back to 1872 of Muybridge's animal locomotion.
Visual-Inertial-Aided Navigation for High-Dynamic Motion in Built Environments Without Initial Conditions
As a follow-up to the on-manifold preintegration theory paper. This paper presents the seminal work on preintegration theory that was motivation in 'On manifold...'.
